title: Foursomes - A T206 Scramble - The Front Nine
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Foursomes - A T206 Scramble - The Front Nine
posts.post_content:
Foursomes are usually seen on the golf course, but now you have a chance to play in the T206 Scramble.  Just pick your team (one from each group) and pay the entry fee of $177 and the team with be shipped to your door and you win.  Remember the scramble price applies only to four man teams.  After forty-eight hours you may buy cards individually for $75 for Group A, $50 for Group B, $40 from Group C and $25 from Group D

The A List
Al Bridwell (with cap) - SGC 60  NC OP Cap included.   SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18395/bridwell-with-cap[/IMG]
Roger Bresnahan (Batting) - BVG 3 Sweet Cap 350    SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10055/bresnahan-batting-hof[/IMG]
Hub Perdue - ungraded VG Southern Leaguer Piedmont 350
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10800/perdue-sl[/IMG]

Making the turn, please go the next post for the C list and D list.


The B List
Fred Payne - SGC 40 SC 350-460
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10288/payne[/IMG]
Fred Clarke (Portrait) - ungraded HOF
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10787/clarke-f-portrait-hof[/IMG]
John Anderson - SGC 50 - Piedmont 350      SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18494/anderson[/IMG]

The C List
Buck Herzog (BOS) - SGC 20 NC OP   SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10255/herzog-boston[/IMG]
Donie Bush - BVG 3 - SC 350
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10080/bush[/IMG]
Art Devlin - BVG 3 - SC 150
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10094/devlin[/IMG]

The D List
James McGinley - BVG 3 - SC 350    SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10155/mcginley[/IMG]
Hal Chase (Blue Portrait) - ungraded NC OS  SOLD
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10929/chase-blue[/IMG]
Chief Meyers  (Batting) - ungraded Piedmont 350
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10852/myers-batting[/IMG]

Any form of no fee payment accepted.  Surcharge may be applied for reg PP.
All prices include shipping.

One foursome has teed off.

Next tee time in ten minutes.;)

Now on the back nine, the first foursome is fifteen over par.:eek::eek::eek:

It's not too late to enter.
